Hi there!

I am Eris! A 27 year old big nerd and geek who enjoys crafting pixels and codes. I live in Germany in a small peaceful Town called Nussdorf. Whilst I'm mostly occupied learning new techs I'm looking for any kind of job that can grand me more indepth experience.

Fluent in german and english, spoken and written. I have mayor knowledge in web development and an eye for design but wouldn't also mind to get to know new stuff.

If you are looking to adopt an seemingly adult with great humor please lets have a chat for busniess inquiries at eristubo@gmail.com
